head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDBERG, DR. BRUCE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDBERG, DR. BRUCE

block.p: GOLDBERG--Dr. Bruce, of East Hills, L.I. on January 21, 2007. Beloved husband of Deborah. Loving father of Adam and Elyssa. Dear Brother of Seth and the late Dr. Glenn. Devoted physician for many years. Services Tuesday 11:30 am at Riverside-Nassau North Chapels. 55 North Station Plaza. Great Neck, NY. 516-487-9600
